Tech N Byte is a IT Service Provider from Bangladesh. Web Hosting is one of their main concerns. They offer Linux based shared web hosting service powered by cPanel with 24x7 Technical Support & 30 Days Money Back Guarantee. All other standard features like SSL Certificates, Script Installer, One Click backup & restore, Advanced DDoS Protection, Malware Protection etc. are also included in every plan.
